entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries and rain showers ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 07:11 AM PST Monday 06 March 2023
